definition: can/to be possible/to be able to/will/to be likely to/to be sure to/to assemble/to meet/to gather/to see/union/group/association/CL:個|个[ge4]/a moment (Taiwan pr. for this sense is [hui3])
improbable/unlikely/will not (act, happen etc)/not able/not having learned to do sth/(coll.) (Tw) don't mention it/not at all
abbr. for 奧林匹克運動會|奥林匹克运动会/Olympic Games/the Olympics

sentences.english: The lesions will "bleach out" and become clean wounds that will heal after a molt.
sentences.chinese: 病變會“漂白了”，成爲清潔傷口癒合後，將蛻皮。

sentences.english: They climb walls, leap off buildings and spy on enemies.
sentences.chinese: 它們會爬牆，能跳下大樓，還能暗中監視敵人。

sentences.english: Fiber will also help regulate the appearance of cellulite.
sentences.chinese: 纖維也會幫助控制脂肪團的形成。

sentences.english: Does Bruce see him as a left-winger or a central midfielder?
sentences.chinese: 布魯斯會把他當成一個左邊鋒還是中場球員？

sentences.english: And Vergeer admits that "sometimes it's tiring always trying to improve.
sentences.chinese: 沃吉爾承認，“有時會對無盡的提高而感到厭煩。”

sentences.english: The cap passes close word, can accelerate the rate of trichomadesis.
sentences.chinese: 帽子過緊的話，會加快脫髮的速度。

sentences.english: This will be a document that you give to a tester.
sentences.chinese: 這樣就會形成你給測試者的一個文件。

sentences.english: anywhere you want to go,  there's always somebody friendly.
sentences.chinese: 無論你想去哪兒，都會有些友好的人。

sentences.english: When I come to Shengzhou, I always stay there.
sentences.chinese: 我每次來嵊舟，都會待在那裏。

sentences.english: I cabled her, but we've been at sea.
sentences.chinese: 他打電報通知我他很快就會回來。

sentences.english: I was baffled that some ofthe most basic workplace blunders seem to be tripping people up!
sentences.chinese: 許多最基本的職場失誤會讓他們摔跟頭，這讓我困惑。

sentences.english: And i have no idea how the hell you get the impressions that Okinawans are pro-Chinese.
sentences.chinese: 我不知道你怎麼會有沖繩縣民親華的印象。

sentences.english: Sometimes a lack of information can lead workers to misperceive that there's preferential treatment, says Mr. Reed.
sentences.chinese: 裏德說，有時候信息的缺乏會讓員工誤以爲老闆偏心。

sentences.english: Nathan noted that the study can't prove that smoking causes diabetes.
sentences.chinese: 內森說此項研究不能證明吸菸會導致糖尿病。

sentences.english: Pray for the government to halt its campaign of targeting Christians .
sentences.chinese: 禱告政府會停止以基督徒爲箭靶的活動。

sentences.english: The real war will never get in the books.
sentences.chinese: 真正的戰爭永遠會隱沒於歷史的黑暗面。

definition: improbable/unlikely/will not (act, happen etc)/not able/not having learned to do sth/(coll.) (Tw) don't mention it/not at all
to yield/to permit/to let sb do sth/to have sb do sth/to make sb (feel sad etc)/by (indicates the agent in a passive clause, like 被[bei4])
only/merely/no more than/but/however/anyway (to get back to a previous topic)/cannot be more (after adjectival)
to agree (to do sth)/should/ought to/must/(legal) shall
to answer/to respond/to comply with/to deal or cope with
should/ought to/probably/must be/to deserve/to owe/to be sb's turn to do sth/that/the above-mentioned
right/correct/couple/pair/towards/at/for/to face/opposite/to treat (sb a certain way)/to match together/to adjust/to fit/to suit/to answer/to reply/classifier: couple
still/still in progress/still more/yet/even more/in addition/fairly/passably (good)/as early as/even/also/else
